divs: Sighting Details9:00 pm We saw what I thought was a meteorite falling 90 degrees - looked orange in color and was west of STRT 741. It then it split in opposite directions into 4-5 bright glowing lighs. The bright lights came back into what looked liked a shape resembling a boomerange shape. We lost sight of it about 3 minutes from first seeing it. I actually saw the same phenomena in July of 2010 around 9:00-9:15 pm in the exact same area. I can't believe I've seen this phenomena twice in my lifetime.
Summary: West of STRT 741 Orange color fire ball that split into 4-5 bright white lights which came back together into a boomerange shape. Seen this exact phenomena in 7-2010
